src_original: ārūpye jīvitendriyaṃ vipāko labhyate /  ukto lābhaḥ //  tyāgo vaktavyaḥ /  so 'yamāviṣkriyate-  mriyamāṇairnirodhyante trīṇyante  jīvitam, manaḥ,  upekṣā ceti /
tgt_original: 此約三界善心命終捨根多少。

src_original: aṣṭau tu madhyame /  rūpadhātau mriyamāṇairaṣṭau nirudhyante /  tāni ca trīṇi,
cakṣurādīni ca pañca /  daśāṣṭau nava catvāri kāme pañca śubhāni vā // Abhidh-d_91 //  ubhayavyañjanairdaśa nirodhyante /  tāni cāṣṭau strīpuruṣendriye ca /  ekavyañjanairnava /

avyañjanairaṣṭau /  sakṛnmaraṇe khalveṣa nyāyaḥ /  krameṇa tu mriyamāṇaiścatvāri nirodhyante kāyajīvitamanaupekṣendriyāṇi /  na hyeṣāṃ pṛthaṅnirodhaḥ /  epa ca vidhiḥ kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya maraṇe draṣṭavyaḥ /
kuśale tu citte sarvatra śraddhādīni pañcādhikāni /  evamārūpyeṣvaṣṭau,  rūpeṣu trayodaśa /
tgt_original: 謂色八加至十三。 欲十加至十五。 九加至十四。
